userStories.title: Create build extraction script
acceptanceCriteria: Create extract_builds.py that parses HTML files
Extract: year, make, model, color, VIN, price from titles/meta
Generate build_id from URL using build_id_generator.py
Output to builds.json with schema compliance
userStories.notes: Created extract_builds.py with URL slug parsing, og:description extraction, Unicode normalization for smart quotes.

userStories.title: Execute build extraction for all HTML files
acceptanceCriteria: Extract builds from all 141 HTML files
userStories.notes: 141/141 builds extracted. 47 have Hennessey packages detected (H1000, VelociRaptor 500, MAMMOTH 1000, Venom, etc). 18 have VINs.

userStories.title: Update sources.json and verify completion
acceptanceCriteria: Mark stage complete if all builds extracted
userStories.notes: Updated sources.json: builds=141. Ready for Stage 4 (Mod Extraction).
